bibl.title: Dayr al-Kubbaniya. Review of the Documentation on the ""Isisberg"" Monastery.
bibl.note: The Names of the Monastery [""Isisberg"" monastery, Dayr al-Shaykha and Dayr al-Kubbaniya]. - The Monastic Site. - The Church Building. - Dating the Church. - Wall painting of the Virgin and a Saint. - Inscriptions. - Pottery. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia.

bibl.seg: Renate Dekker, Dayr al-Kubbaniya. Review of the Documentation on the ""Isisberg"" Monastery.
Gawdat Gabra & Hany N. Takla (edd.), Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia (Cairo - New York, 2013) pp. 93-103, 5 figg.

The Names of the Monastery [""Isisberg"" monastery, Dayr al-Shaykha and Dayr al-Kubbaniya]. - The Monastic Site. - The Church Building. - Dating the Church. - Wall painting of the Virgin and a Saint. - Inscriptions. - Pottery. - Conclusion.
